Name: Week 1
Subjects: Introduction, EPE, bias, variance, collinearity (OLS, Ridge, KNN, K-means)

Name: Week 2
Subjects: Model selection [CV, Bootstrap, Cp, AIC, BIC] Case 1 handout
Literature: ESL Chapter 7. You may skip sections 7.8 and 7.9

Name: Week 3
Subjects: Sparse regression and multiple testing [Lasso, Elastic Net, Bonferroni, BH, FDR]

Name: Week 4
Subjects: Linear classifiers [LDA, QDA, Logistic Regression, Splines, ROC]

Name: Week 7
Subjects: Basis expansion, Support Vector Machine and convex optimization

Name: Week 9
Subjects: Unsupervised clustering [Hierarchical Clustering, K-means, Gaussian Mixtures, Gap statistic]

Name: Week 10
Subjects: Unsupervised decompositions [SC, NMF, AA and ICA]

Name: Week 11
Subjects: Artificial Neural Networks and Self Organizing Maps
